RAPID_FIRE.name: Rapid Fire
RAPID_FIRE.description: Make X additional attacks when target within half range

ASSAULT.name: Assault
ASSAULT.description: No penalty when shooting after advancing or falling back

HEAVY.name: Heavy
HEAVY.description: Subtract 1 from hit rolls if the shooter moved this turn

MELTA.name: Melta
MELTA.description: Roll 2 dice for damage and pick the highest result when target is within X hexes

BLAST.name: Blast
BLAST.description: Cannot target units that are in melee combat

PISTOL.name: Pistol
PISTOL.description: Can be fired even if shooter is within melee range of enemy units

GRENADE.name: Grenade
GRENADE.description: Only one grenade weapon per unit can be fired per phase

TORRENT.name: Torrent
TORRENT.description: Automatically hits the target (no hit roll required)
